value.title: StarCraft 2: The VERY BEST Of The VERY WORST! (Viewer Games)

value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 Battle Royale 6-man free-for-all between Maru, SuperNova, Taeja, Stats, Patience and Ragnarok. value.title: StarCraft 2: Zest's FINAL Tournament Match! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Zest (Protoss) and Clem (Terran). Zest has announced that he is starting up his mandatory military service in South Korea very soon, and because of that he is forced to retire from StarCraft 2.
